infos.value: You've finally made it. I grew weary of waiting.
I thought it better to wait for the right time.
...What do you mean?
Lord Mont's party has outrun us by now.
Even for us born to this snowy terrain, they are too far gone.
...I see.
In other words, we can do battle without restraint.
Will you not surrender?
Before we've even crossed blades? That will not do.
I suppose this is Hourne's pride in action... How unfortunate.
Have at you!
As you wish!
Do try to endure until Lord Mont's return.
Take him.
Why would someone as skilled as you serve the likes of Wezette?
There are some who live to defy their fate, while there are others who cannot live without it.
I would be the latter.
Follow me...
Everything has gone as you foresaw, I take it?
Does that irk you?
Do you not feel that your talents are being wasted in such a far-flung castle?
I have no interest in joining you.
...Hmph. Then stay here and suffocate beneath the snow.
You're unwed, right?
What of it?
If you want to get ahead in life, you ought to marry someone like me. Hahaha.
